sense.def:
Movement
pomeni spremembo položaja ali odhod z enega kraja drugam.

seg.quote: He heard movement in the hut.
Tom lit a cigarette with quick, jerky movements.

sense.def:
Movement
je tudi postopna sprememba v stališčih, mnenju ali politiki.

seg.quote: There was a movement towards a revival of conscription.

sense.def:
One's movements
je vse, kar naredimo ali nameravamo narediti v nekem obdobju.

seg.quote: I don't know why you have any interest in my movements.

sense.def:
A movement
je tudi skupina ljudi, ki jih povezujejo enaka prepričanja, ideje ali cilji.

seg.quote: ...the successful movement to abolish child labour.

sense.def:
V klasični glasbi je
a movement
eden izmed večjih delov skladbe.

seg.quote: There is an immensely long first movement.
